name: brambleghast

abilities.name: wind-rider
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.

abilities.name: infiltrator
abilities.description: Passes through the foe’s barrier and strikes.

description: It will open the branches of its head to envelop its prey. Once it absorbs all the life energy it needs, it expels the prey and discards it.
